Project.Name: lcogt
Project.Title: Las Cumbres Observatory Global Telescope Network

SearchGroup.Name: lcogt
SearchGroup.Title: Las Cumbres Observatory Global Telescope Network

EnumValue.Title: Image is entirely enclosed by search region

DEGREE.Name: size
DEGREE.Title: Search Region (Square) Size
DEGREE.ShortDescription: Enter the region size of the search

DEGREE.Name: subsize
DEGREE.Title: Return Image Size (leave blank for full images)
DEGREE.ShortDescription:
Specifies the size of the desired image cutout. Omitting this constraint will result in visualization/return of entire L1 images.
In multi-input mode, this takes effect only for input tables without a subsize column.

EnumString.Name: mcenter
EnumString.Title: Return only the most centered image containing the target:
EnumString.ShortDescription:
Specifies whether to return only the most centered (in pixel space) image-set for the given input position.
In multi-input mode, this flag applies only for input tables without a best column.

FieldGroup.Label: Enter date range to search, format example: 2010-01-10 15:30:00, or 2010-01-10.

EnumString.Name: siteid
EnumString.Title: Select Observation Site(s):
EnumString.ErrorDescription: Please select at least one telescope
